content: What books would you recommend to start learning Rust?
Definitely recommend The Rust Programming Language, which is available online https://doc.rust-lang.org/book
https://www.rust-lang.org/learn also has some other resources which you may find helpful
Rust by example is pretty good too https://doc.rust-lang.org/rust-by-example/
I've heard good things about the Blandy and Orendorff book as well.
Rust in Action seems pretty nice, too, and the author sometimes often posts discount codes for substantial amounts
Not a book, but since you mentioned Rust in Action, I'll mention our Rust in Motion.
Rust by Example was one of the ways I learned Rust too :smile:
